snippet.title: The Last Door: Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Episodic horror game, with original low-res visuals and a gorgeous orchestral music score. Surrounded by a thrilling sound atmosphere, player's will experience a really immersive environment through the stimulation of their imagination, just like classic horror writers like Poe and Lovecraft used to.

This game takes part of a daring project coming from a small indie studio. Each chapter is funded by the game community through the website: http://www.TheLastDoor.com

This is a FREE game! Each time we publish a new chapter, the previous one becomes free for everybody. You can support the development of the next chapter thourgh a 'pay what you want' donation, to unlock the newest chapter. More info: http://thelastdoor.com/index.php/donate

Browser game: compatible with Windows, Mac and Linux. No install required.

Pilot Chapter also available for iPad: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id720709060

What the media says about the game:
"Love letter to Lovecraft". Penny Arcade.
"Soon, I will stop trembling". Gamezebo.
"The world, particularly the audio, has found its way inside my head." Rock, Paper, Shotgun.
"While you can't see the terror-stricken face of a dead body, you can imagine it, and I always find that to be much more horrifying." Indiestatik.

● ● ● ● ○ (4.2 / 5)
Rating on Kongregate.
More than 200k gameplays.

● ● ● ● ● ● ● ● ○ ○ (8 / 10)
Rating on ArmorGames.
More than 165k gameplays.

Accessibility options:
- Dyslexia-friendly font.
- Descriptions of sounds (closed captions).

Available in many language, thanks to community provided translations.

Also find us in: 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/horroradventure
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheLastDoor
Google+: https://plus.google.com/u/1/+LastDoorTheGame/
Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=189893958
Indiedb: http://www.indiedb.com/games/the-last-door/
Bandcamp: http://thegamekitchen.bandcamp.com/
